comments:
I20061030-1704

When a JAR is removed outside the workspace (or while not running and then started) and the Java project not refreshed then open type still finds types from that JAR. That is the same behavior as in 3.2.x BUT: in 3.2.x a dialog tells that the type cannot be opened. In I20061030-1704 the dialog goes ahead and opens the editor which of course shows an error. In addition a log entry is created.

Steps:
1. start fresh workspace
2. import org.eclipse.text (or any other project) as binary project
3. exit
4. delete the JAR from the workspace
5. start
6. Ctrl+Shift+T
7. type "ADoc*"
   ==> AbstractDocument is listed
8. select it


The .log entry:
